name: Classic Fudgy Brownie
description: Rich, dense, and ultra-fudgy chocolate brownie made with premium cocoa and real chocolate chunks. Perfect for true chocolate lovers.

name: Wheat Choco Chip Cookies
description: Delicious whole wheat cookies studded with melt-in-your-mouth chocolate chips. A healthy twist on a classic favorite.

name: Choco Truffle Pastry
description: A decadent pastry layered with velvety chocolate ganache and soft sponge, topped with rich truffle cream.

name: Cup Cakes
description: Soft and fluffy cupcakes available in chocolate and vanilla flavors, topped with whipped cream and sprinkles.
